message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a price of $20,000. It's a great opportunity to own something truly valuable, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, $20,000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I can only offer $10,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

I understand that $10,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $17,000. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice.  $17,000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to go up to $12,000. This is a fair price considering my budget and the value the product brings to me.

I'm glad you're willing to go up to $12,000, Bob. However, considering the value of the product and the time we've spent negotiating, I think we can do better than that. I'm willing to meet you at $14,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a fair price for both of us.
